name: Hunter Poacher
description:
Hunter poacher is a game of strategy, trickery, and luck. It involves stealth, mind games, and atomic weapons. It is a 2 player game meant to be played on separate devices. 

 You play as either BLU or RED and your mission is to score 5 points. To score a point, you must either collect bait or nuke your opponents. Every round, you and your opponent select an action (either move or nuke) and they both get executed simultaneously. The thing is, you cannot see where your opponent is located unless they are close by, collected bait, or tried to nuke you.
